## ğŸ“‹ Content Creation Checklist

<details>
<summary>ğŸ“‘ <b>Click to expand the content creation checklist</b></summary>

### ğŸ“Œ Content Quality:
- [ ] 2-3 sentence executive summary at the top
- [ ] Consistent file naming (`ifs-[challenge]-step[step#]-[slug].md`)
- [ ] Estimated time to complete included
- [ ] Step progress indicators (`Step X of Y`) added
- [ ] All images have descriptive alt text
- [ ] Language-specific fenced code blocks used
- [ ] Includes a detailed Table of Contents

### ğŸ”„ Navigation Elements:
- [ ] Breadcrumb navigation at the top
- [ ] "Back to Top" links after major sections
- [ ] Previous/next navigation at top and bottom
- [ ] Cross-links to related content in other challenges
- [ ] Links to prerequisites for dependent steps

### ğŸ“Š Metadata & Organization:
- [ ] Proper frontmatter with version, last_updated, and tags
- [ ] Added relevant tags (#aihub, #rag, #agents)
- [ ] Success criteria clearly formatted
</details>
